allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Restructure academy repo and remove company-specific references

Changes:
- Rename ''MLE Capstone Project'' to ''ML Engineering'' for consistency
- Move standalone workshops into ML Engineering/notebooks
- Remove enterprise-specific references \(nexus URLs, JDK paths\)
- Rename ''Bank Customer Churn'' to ''Customer Churn'' dataset
- Replace ''banks'' with ''financial institutions''
- Add .gitattributes to treat notebooks as binary

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
